item.description:
This year the Post Club is celebrating their Annual Post-Holiday Party at the Newton Sheraton.
It’ll be an evening of fine dancing, fabulous food and fascinating singles.

Put it on your calendar today! Make sure you sign up soon – there are a limited number of tickets and lots of interested partygoers!

To sign up, you need to call the Post Club directly at: 617-332-2582
or you can drop by their offices at 313 Washington Street (3rd floor), Newton (right across the street from the Newton Sheraton) and sign up in person.

Cost: $75.00 for Post Club members / $85 non-members beginning January 15th

NOTE:
(1) As a non-Post Club member, if you mention "Boston Event Guide" when you sign up (before Jan. 15th) you can get a $5 discount => your ticket will cost $70.

(2) Several of our Meetup members have attended multiple events at the Newton Sheraton in the past, and it is a great location: Really nice ballroom, excellent food, great service, covered parking garage right next to the hotel, and those "heavenly beds" (if you stay over) are - as they say - really heavenly!

(3) The hotel has some special room rate deals for the month of January. If you are prepared to pre-book and pre-pay for your room before Jan. 11th, you can get a rate for as little as $109+tax.
Book online at the Sheraton web-site or call 1-866-716-8120 and reference rate code TOPDEAL1 for weekend stays.
item.how_to_find_us: Check the hotel function/event listing for Post Club Holiday Party
item.name: Singles Post-Holiday Party (Dinner, Dancing)
